inclusion.criterion: HER2-positive Stage I histologically confirmed invasive carcinoma of the breast
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bilateral breast cancers that individually meet eligibility criteria are allowed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects with multifocal or multicentric disease are eligible as long as each tumor individually meets eligibility criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Should have tumor tissue available and a tissue block of sufficient size to make 15 slides, which must be sent to a DFCI site for testing
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Less than or equal to 90 days since most recent breast surgery for this breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All tumor should be removed by either a modified radical mastectomy or a segmental mastectomy (lumpectomy) with either a sentinel node biopsy or axillary dissection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All margins should be clear of invasive cancer or DCIS
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: May have received up to 4 weeks of tamoxifen therapy or other hormonal therapy, for adjuvant therapy for this cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior oophorectomy for cancer prevention is allowed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who have undergone partial breast radiation (duration <= 7 days) prior to registration are eligible. Partial breast radiation must be completed prior to 2 weeks before starting protocol therapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must have discontinued any investigational drug at least 2 weeks prior to participation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of potent CYP3A4 inhibitors during the study treatment period
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Excessive alcohol intake (more than 3 alcoholic beverages per day)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of previous invasive breast cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of prior chemotherapy in the past 5 years
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of prior trastuzumab or prior paclitaxel therapy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a postmenopausal woman with HER2-positive breast cancer, meeting most eligibility criteria. However, history of previous invasive breast cancer and prior chemotherapy in the past 5 years are unknown.
